EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-General.Email 9_Security cloud for large enterprise
EmailTemplate.subject: Go behind the scenes of successful security cloud implementations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> SUCCESSFUL security cloud implementations reveal efficiencies and savings Hello Sir/Madam,
Leverage lessons learned along the way to a successful security cloud and reduce the challenges of the architecture development process.
Read the use case “Security cloud for large enterprises <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_Security.Cloud.LargeEnterprise.LP.html?did=d000000000az&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 9a-securitycloudforLEusecase&utm_term=general]]>” to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations and how you can:
- Provide security and compliance - Evolve in sync with the fastest moving environment - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent for your large enterprise cloud environment!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
